translations: v.剥夺，使丧失；免去……的职务（尤指圣职）

sentences.sentence: To deprive the boy of his education is a violation of state law.
sentences.translation: 剥夺这个男孩的受教育权是一种违反州法律的行为。

sentences.sentence: It may deprive a team of business opportunities.
sentences.translation: 它可能会剥夺一个团队的商业机会。

sentences.sentence: This will deprive your body of vital energy needs.
sentences.translation: 这将剥夺你身体对生命能量的需求。
